name: Nowhere to Hide (Tim Mitcheson, Joshua Aubrey)
name_original: Nowhere to Hide (Tim Mitcheson, Joshua Aubrey)
description:
Based on the book Strange Case Of Dr Jeykll and Mr Hyde, you play as the duo trying to find a cure for the predicament you are in. Explore the streets of an old time Soho in order to find your scattered vials of chemicals, which will be combined to create the cure. You can transform into Mr Hyde at any point to increase your ability to scale buildings, however you are over taken by rage, seeing red, and also your tire easily. Are you able to help the pair cure their problem?

Controls -

WASD - Move

Q - Change Form

The form changes back to Jekyll after 6 seconds. Wait for 4 seconds and then you can transform again.

Made for Global Game Jam 2022 - https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/nowhere-hyde-2
